General.Name: Paymentus Holdings Inc
General.Description: Paymentus Holdings, Inc. provides cloud-based bill payment technology and solutions in the United States and internationally. The company offers electronic bill presentment and payment services, enterprise customer communication, and self-service revenue management to billers through a software-as-a-service technology platform. Its platform's payment processing includes credit cards, debit cards, eChecks, and digital wallets. The company serves utility, financial service, government, insurance, telecommunication, real estate management, education, consumer finance, healthcare, and small business industries. Paymentus Holdings, Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina.
General.Address: 11605 North Community House Road, Charlotte, NC, United States, 28277
